Key Match Events: Alejandro Kirk slammed an opposite field liner to right, delivering both baserunners
Vladimir Guerrero cracked a leadoff double to right center, just over the outstretched glove of Jarren Duran
Pre-Game Insights: The teams entered play Wednesday with the Red Sox a game and a half in front of the Rays in the standings
Post-Match Reflections: The Red Sox were officially eliminated from playoff contention with the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox dropped a 6-1 decision to the Toronto Blue Jays, snapping what had been a four-game streak
The loss, coupled with wins by both Kansas City and Detroit, officially eliminated the Red Sox from playoff contention
Others: The Blue Jays jumped on rookie starter Richard Fitts for two runs in the fourth and two more in the fifth and never looked back
